summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the amended assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1855, for the improvement of Central Place, from Russell Avenue to Tallman Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, by regarding and curbing the same, by constructing concrete sidewalks, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 19248 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
